latino_east_african_gravity_models:nopal.long_name: Nopalito access score (Empirical cumulative density function)
latino_east_african_gravity_models:nopal.short_description: Nopalito access score by item availability using an empirical cumulative density function.
latino_east_african_gravity_models:nopal.long_description: Nopalito access score by item availability using an empirical cumulative density function. Item availbility determined by webscraping grocery retailer with an online presence. Nopalito is defined as a Latino staple food by The Food Group
latino_east_african_gravity_models:nopal.statement: The nopalito access score in {features.name} is {value}.
